title: Paws Shelter Admin Dashboard
description: An admin dashboard for an animal shelter, designed with a sleek and intuitive interface. Admins can easily access detailed information about available inventory, shelter residents, employees, volunteers, and fosters.

title: Ravenous
description: Users can view personalized restaurant recommendations based on their location and search criteria. Users can filter the results according to their preferences, including best match, highest rating, and most reviews.

title: Turbo Auto Dealers
description: A responsive custom-designed web application for a Subaru car dealership. Users can view dealership hours and locations through Mapbox and effortlessly browse and filter available inventory to find their perfect ride.

title: EBQ Landing Page
description: Sample responsive landing page for EBQ
